sentences.en: A flea's parasitic way of life is a kind of ectoparasitism.
sentences.cn: 跳蚤的寄居方式属于外寄生.

sentences.en: A NEW PARASITIC NEMATODE OF THE FAMILY HELIGMOSOMATIDAE CRAM , 1927 ( TRICHOSTRONGYLOIDEA )
sentences.cn: 绕体科寄生线虫一新种—— ( 毛圆目:绕体科 )

sentences.en: For example, parasitic thermocouples exist in normal circuit wiring.
sentences.cn: 例如, 寄生热电偶存在于正常电路配线里.

sentences.en: Genomic analysis of parasitic human pathogens, particularly Plasmodium falciparum, and Leishmania major.
sentences.cn: 人类寄生性病原体的基因体分析, 特别是疟原虫与利什曼原虫.

sentences.en: He lives a parasitic existence, borrowing money from his friends.
sentences.cn: 他靠向友人借贷过寄生生活.

sentences.en: Imperialism is monopolistic, parasitic and moribund capitalism.
sentences.cn: 帝国主义是垄断的 、 寄生的、垂死的资本主义.
幼虫寄生在绵羊的身上。

sentences.en: Mites are a tiny parasitic insect, the cask has some defensive effect.
sentences.cn: 螨虫是一种微小的寄生小虫, 木桶也有一定的防御效果.

sentences.en: Parasitic plants live in part or entirely within the tissues of other plants.
sentences.cn: 寄生植物部分或全部生长在其它植物的组织中.

sentences.en: Plant - parasitic nematodes cause heavy yield losses in many crops.
sentences.cn: 在许多农作物中,植物寄生线虫引起重大损失.

sentences.en: The damage of plant parasitic nematodes to soybeans is generally unrecognized.
sentences.cn: 植物寄生线虫对大豆的危害还未受到普遍重视.

sentences.en: The family property will be exhausted by those parasitic sons before long.
sentences.cn: 这份家业迟早要凋败在那几个好吃懒做的儿子手里.

sentences.en: The hatching larvae are parasitic, feeding on the flesh of the host.
sentences.cn: 幼虫在孵化过程中是寄生的, 靠寄主的肉为生.

sentences.en: This even applied to the parasitic Flood infestation on Halo.
sentences.cn: 甚至应用到光晕上那寄生的害虫洪魔身上.

sentences.en: Trichomonas parasitic in the human body can only urogenital.
sentences.cn: 毛滴虫只能寄生于人体的泌尿生殖道.

trans.tran_cn: 寄生的，寄生物的，由寄生虫引起的
trans.tran_en: living in or on another plant or animal and getting food from them
